pages.title: Silentwood
pages.text: $(#008cff)Silentwood$() tools are the most basic Aurorian tools you can make. They're about the same as regular wood, except some tools have special abilities.$(br2)All Aurorian tools require $(#008cff)Silentwood Sticks$(), opposed to vanilla sticks.

pages.title: Aurorian Stone
pages.text: $(#008cff)Aurorian Stone$() tools are a bit faster than vanilla stone tools. Some tools have special abilities like $(#008cff)Silentwood$().

pages.title: Aurorian Coal
pages.text: $(#008cff)Aurorian Coal$() can be used to smelt things in the furnace. It can also be turned into $(#008cff)Aurorian Coal Nuggets$() that can smelt exactly one item!

pages.title: Cerulean
pages.text: Unlike other materials, $(#008cff)Cerulean$() can't be used for tools, but instead used to make Armor, Buckets, and other special items!

pages.title: Moonstone
pages.text: $(#008cff)Moonstone$() is a magical material! It works best at night, but worse during the day. It's a small bit better than iron tools.

pages.title: Geodes/Crystals
pages.text: $(#008cff)Crystals$() are got by mining $(#008cff)Geode Ores$() and can be found all throughout The Aurorian. It cannot be used for tools or armor, but it's a very important ingredient for crafting!
